data.text: Murat Harri Uyghur, A Finnish citizen, says his mum was taken to one of China's Muslim internment camps in Apr 2017. In Jan, his dad was too. He hasn't heard from them since. He's one of three dozen inmates' relatives that @evadou & I spoke to https://t.co/7KburQAjua https://t.co/gOXWTAv8Xx
